participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, enjoys culinary arts and spending time with loved ones.
participant_1.background: I like to watch talk shows and sitcoms while I drink my coffee. I decided to move to Salt Lake City to be with my girlfriend. I work as a chef and love to come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes. my favorite band is hop along. I once got food poisoning from a cheeseburger at a diner in the Midwest.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Passionate about hobbies and family, with a playful side and a love for comics.
participant_2.background: I love mushroom ravioli and I'm getting married soon! I live in a small home and love my collection of comic books. I'm looking for a home with a large room to build my models in. i work part time. I work out vigorously to keep in shape and avoid eating vegetables that I dislike, which my parents are unaware of.

content.text: Good! I'm getting married next month!
What are you planning to do for the wedding?
We're keeping it pretty small, just immediate family and close friends.
Yeah, we're just trying to keep it casual and fun.
What are you most looking forward to about the wedding?
Just spending time with all of our loved ones.
Yeah, I'm really looking forward to it.
I'm sure it will be a great day.
